text: The 1963 Volta a Catalunya was the 43rd edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 8 September to 15 September 1963. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Joseph Novales. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 30" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 39" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 57" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 22" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 20" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 36" |} |} ==References== 1963 Volta Category:1963 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1963 sports events
